Class FileClient

java.lang.Object
app.apollo.client.FileClient
public class FileClient extends Object
FileClient is responsible for interacting with the remote FileService. It provides methods for uploading, downloading, deleting, and listing files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FileClient(FileService fileService)
    Constructor to initialize the FileClient with a remote FileService.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileClient

      public FileClient(FileService fileService)
      Constructor to initialize the FileClient with a remote FileService. It also attempts to load the last logged user's ID from a file.
      Parameters:
      fileService - The remote file service to use.

  • Method Details

    • setLastLoggedUserFileName

      public static void setLastLoggedUserFileName(String lastLoggedUserFileName)
      Sets the file name used to store the last logged user's ID.
      Parameters:
      lastLoggedUserFileName - The file name to set.

    • upload

      public void upload(String filename, String token)
      Uploads a file to the remote service.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to upload.
      token - The authentication token of the user.

    • delete

      public void delete(String filename, String token)
      Deletes a file from the remote service.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to delete.
      token - The authentication token of the user.

    • download

      public void download(String filename, String localPath, String token)
      Downloads a file from the remote service.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to download.
      localPath - The local path to save the downloaded file.
      token - The authentication token of the user.

    • listFiles

      public List<String> listFiles(String token)
      Lists all files available on the remote service.
      Parameters:
      token - The authentication token of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of file names.

    • setClientID

      public void setClientID(int clientID)
      Sets the client ID for this FileClient instance.
      Parameters:
      clientID - The client ID to set.

    • getClientID

      public int getClientID()
      Retrieves the client ID for this FileClient instance.
      Returns:
      The client ID.
